member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation).
member.remarks: Default value = "fb".

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ActivePoseHelper.UseGravityCompensation
member.summary: Apply gravity compensation.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ActivePoseHelper.AnimSource
member.summary: Animation source.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ApplyImpulseHelper for sending a ApplyImpulse to a given .
member.param: The to send the ApplyImpulse to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.EqualizeAmount
member.summary: 0 means straight impulse, 1 means multiply by the mass (change in velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.PartIndex
member.summary: Index of part being hit. -1 apply impulse to COM.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = -1. Max value = 28.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.Impulse
member.summary: Impulse vector (impulse is change in momentum).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -4500.0f. Max value = 4500.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.HitPoint
member.summary: Optional point on part where hit. If not supplied then the impulse is applied at the part center.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: Hit point in local coordinates of body part.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.LocalImpulseInfo
member.summary: Impulse in local coordinates of body part.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.AngularImpulse
member.summary: Impulse should be considered an angular impulse.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ApplyBulletImpulseHelper for sending a ApplyBulletImpulse to a given .
member.param: The to send the ApplyBulletImpulse to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.EqualizeAmount
member.summary: 0 means straight impulse, 1 means multiply by the mass (change in velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.PartIndex
member.summary: Index of part being hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 28.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.Impulse
member.summary: Impulse vector (impulse is change in momentum).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1000.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.HitPoint
member.summary: Optional point on part where hit.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: True = hitPoint is in local coordinates of bodyPart, false = hit point is in world coordinates.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.ExtraShare
member.summary: If not 0.0 then have an extra bullet applied to spine0 (approximates the COM). Uses setup from configureBulletsExtra. 0-1 shared 0.0 = no extra bullet, 0.5 = impulse split equally between extra and bullet, 1.0 only extra bullet. LT 0.0 then bullet + scaled extra bullet. Eg.-0.5 = bullet + 0.5 impulse extra bullet.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper
member.summary: Set the amount of relaxation across the whole body; Used to collapse the character into a rag-doll-like state.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyRelaxHelper for sending a BodyRelax to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyRelax to.
member.remarks: Set the amount of relaxation across the whole body; Used to collapse the character into a rag-doll-like state.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Relaxation
member.summary: How relaxed the body becomes, in percentage relaxed. 100 being totally rag-dolled, 0 being very stiff and rigid.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Damping
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Mask
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = "fb.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.HoldPose
member.summary: Automatically hold the current pose as the character relaxes - can be used to avoid relaxing into a t-pose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.DisableJointDriving
member.summary: Sets the drive state to free - this reduces drifting on the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper
member.summary: This single message allows you to configure various parameters used on any behavior that uses the dynamic balance.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBalanceHelper for sending a ConfigureBalance to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBalance to.
member.remarks: This single message allows you to configure various parameters used on any behavior that uses the dynamic balance.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepHeight
member.summary: Maximum height that character steps vertically (above 0.2 is high ... But OK underwater).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.4f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepHeightInc4Step
member.summary: Added to stepHeight if going up steps.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.4f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsApartRestep
member.summary: If the legs end up more than (legsApartRestep + hipwidth) apart even though balanced, take another step.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsTogetherRestep
member.summary: Mmmm0.1 for drunk if the legs end up less than (hipwidth - legsTogetherRestep) apart even though balanced, take another step. A value of 1 will turn off this feature and the max value is hipWidth = 0.23f by default but is model dependent.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsApartMax
member.summary: FRICTION WORKAROUND: if the legs end up more than (legsApartMax + hipwidth) apart when balanced, adjust the feet positions to slide back so they are legsApartMax + hipwidth apart. Needs to be less than legsApartRestep to see any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.TaperKneeStrength
member.summary: Does the knee strength reduce with angle.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeftLegSwingDamping
member.summary: Damping of left leg during swing phase (mmmmDrunk used 1.25 to slow legs movement).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.2f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.RightLegSwingDamping
member.summary: Damping of right leg during swing phase (mmmmDrunk used 1.25 to slow legs movement).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.2f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.OpposeGravityLegs
member.summary: Gravity opposition applied to hips and knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.OpposeGravityAnkles
member.summary: Gravity opposition applied to ankles. General balancer likes 1.0. StaggerFall likes 0.1.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAcc
member.summary: Multiplier on the floorAcceleration added to the lean.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.HipLeanAcc
member.summary: Multiplier on the floorAcceleration added to the leanHips.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAccMax
member.summary: Max floorAcceleration allowed for lean and leanHips.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ResistAcc
member.summary: Level of cheat force added to character to resist the effect of floorAcceleration (anti-Acceleration) - added to upperbody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ResistAccMax
member.summary: Max floorAcceleration allowed for anti-Acceleration. If GT 20.0 then it is probably in a crash.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootSlipCompOnMovingFloor
member.summary: This parameter will be removed when footSlipCompensation preserves the foot angle on a moving floor]. If the character detects a moving floor and footSlipCompOnMovingFloor is false then it will turn off footSlipCompensation - at footSlipCompensation preserves the global heading of the feet. If footSlipCompensation is off then the character usually turns to the side in the end although when turning the vehicle turns it looks promising for a while.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AnkleEquilibrium
member.summary: Ankle equilibrium angle used when static balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraFeetApart
member.summary: Additional feet apart setting.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DontStepTime
member.summary: Amount of time at the start of a balance before the character is allowed to start stepping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceAbortThreshold
member.summary: When the character gives up and goes into a fall. Larger values mean that the balancer can lean more before failing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpHeight
member.summary: Height between lowest foot and COM below which balancer will give up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepClampScale
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepClampScaleVariance
member.summary: Variance in clamp scale every step. If negative only takes away from clampScale.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTimeHip
member.summary: Amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to move hip to (kind of). Will be controlled by balancer in future but can help recover spine quicker from bending forwards to much.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTime
member.summary: Amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to step to. Bigger values try to recover with fewer, bigger steps. Smaller values recover with smaller steps, and generally recover less.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTimeVariance
member.summary: Variance in predictionTime every step. If negative only takes away from predictionTime.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MaxSteps
member.summary: Maximum number of steps that the balancer will take.
member.remarks: Default value = 100. Min value = 1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MaxBalanceTime
member.summary: Maximum time(seconds) that the balancer will balance for.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraSteps
member.summary: Allow the balancer to take this many more steps before hitting maxSteps. If negative nothing happens(safe default).
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraTime
member.summary: Allow the balancer to balance for this many more seconds before hitting maxBalanceTime. If negative nothing happens(safe default).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallType
member.summary: How to fall after maxSteps or maxBalanceTime.
member.remarks: Default value = . If BCR has to be active.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallMult
member.summary: Multiply the rampDown of stiffness on falling by this amount ( GT 1 fall quicker).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallReduceGravityComp
member.summary: Reduce gravity compensation as the legs weaken on falling.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.RampHipPitchOnFail
member.summary: Bend over when falling after maxBalanceTime.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StableLinSpeedThresh
member.summary: Linear speed threshold for successful balance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StableRotSpeedThresh
member.summary: Rotational speed threshold for successful balance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FailMustCollide
member.summary: The upper body of the character must be colliding and other failure conditions met to fail.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.IgnoreFailure
member.summary: Ignore maxSteps and maxBalanceTime and try to balance forever.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ChangeStepTime
member.summary: Time not in contact (airborne) before step is changed. If -ve don't change step.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceIndefinitely
member.summary: Ignore maxSteps and maxBalanceTime and try to balance forever.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MovingFloor
member.summary: Temporary variable to ignore movingFloor code that generally causes the character to fall over if the feet probe a moving object e.g. treading on a gun.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AirborneStep
member.summary: When airborne try to step. Set to false for e.g. shotGun reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.UseComDirTurnVelThresh
member.summary: Velocity below which the balancer turns in the direction of the COM forward instead of the ComVel - for use with shot from running with high upright constraint use 1.9.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MinKneeAngle
member.summary: Minimum knee angle (-ve value will mean this functionality is not applied). 0.4 seems a good value.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.5f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FlatterSwingFeet
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FlatterStaticFeet
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidLeg
member.summary: If true then balancer tries to avoid leg2leg collisions/avoid crossing legs. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidFootWidth
member.summary: NB. Very sensitive. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot. AvoidFootWidth = how much inwards from the ankle this line is in (m).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidFeedback
member.summary: NB. Very sensitive. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot. Avoid doesn't allow the desired stepping foot to cross the line. avoidFeedback = how much of the actual crossing of that line is fedback as an error.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAgainstVelocity
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepDecisionThreshold
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepIfInSupport
member.summary: The balancer sometimes decides to step even if balanced.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AlwaysStepWithFarthest
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StandUp
member.summary: Standup more with increased velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DepthFudge
member.summary: Supposed to increase foot friction: Impact depth of a collision with the foot is changed when the balancer is running - impact.SetDepth(impact.GetDepth() - depthFudge).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DepthFudgeStagger
member.summary: Supposed to increase foot friction: Impact depth of a collision with the foot is changed when staggerFall is running - impact.SetDepth(impact.GetDepth() - depthFudgeStagger).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootFriction
member.summary: Foot friction multiplier is multiplied by this amount if balancer is running.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootFrictionStagger
member.summary: Foot friction multiplier is multiplied by this amount if staggerFall is running.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BackwardsLeanCutoff
member.summary: Backwards lean threshold to cut off stay upright forces. 0.0 Vertical - 1.0 horizontal. 0.6 is a sensible value. NB: the balancer does not fail in order to give stagger that extra step as it falls. A backwards lean of GT 0.6 will generally mean the balancer will soon fail without stayUpright forces.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpHeightEnd
member.summary: If this value is different from giveUpHeight, actual giveUpHeight will be ramped toward this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceAbortThresholdEnd
member.summary: If this value is different from balanceAbortThreshold, actual balanceAbortThreshold will be ramped toward this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpRampDuration
member.summary: Duration of ramp from start of behavior for above two parameters. If smaller than 0, no ramp is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanToAbort
member.summary: Lean at which to send abort message when maxSteps or maxBalanceTime is reached.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceResetHelper
member.summary: Reset the values configurable by the Configure Balance message to their defaults.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceResetHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBalanceResetHelper for sending a ConfigureBalanceReset to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBalanceReset to.
member.remarks: Reset the values configurable by the Configure Balance message to their defaults.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper
member.summary: This single message allows to configure self avoidance for the character.BBDD Self avoidance tech.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper for sending a ConfigureSelfAvoidance to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureSelfAvoidance to.
member.remarks: This single message allows to configure self avoidance for the character.BBDD Self avoidance tech.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.UseSelfAvoidance
member.summary: Enable or disable self avoidance tech.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.OverwriteDragReduction
member.summary: Specify whether self avoidance tech should use original IK input target or the target that has been already modified by getStabilisedPos() tech i.e. function that compensates for rotational and linear velocity of shoulder/thigh.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.TorsoSwingFraction
member.summary: Place the adjusted target this much along the arc between effector (wrist) and target, value in range [0,1].
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.MaxTorsoSwingAngleRad
member.summary: Max value on the effector (wrist) to adjusted target offset.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.6f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.SelfAvoidIfInSpineBoundsOnly
member.summary: Restrict self avoidance to operate on targets that are within character torso bounds only.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.SelfAvoidAmount
member.summary: Amount of self avoidance offset applied when angle from effector (wrist) to target is greater then right angle i.e. when total offset is a blend between where effector currently is to value that is a product of total arm length and selfAvoidAmount. SelfAvoidAmount is in a range between [0, 1].
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.OverwriteTwist
member.summary: Overwrite desired IK twist with self avoidance procedural twist.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.UsePolarPathAlgorithm
member.summary: Use the alternative self avoidance algorithm that is based on linear and polar target blending. WARNING: It only requires "radius" in terms of parametrization.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.Radius
member.summary: Self avoidance radius, measured out from the spine axis along the plane perpendicular to that axis. The closer is the proximity of reaching target to that radius, the more polar (curved) motion is used for offsetting the target. WARNING: Parameter only used by the alternative algorithm that is based on linear and polar target blending.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBulletsHelper for sending a ConfigureBullets to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBullets to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpreadOverParts
member.summary: Spreads impulse across parts. Currently only for spine parts, not limbs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseLeakageStrengthScaled
member.summary: For weaker characters subsequent impulses remain strong.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulsePeriod
member.summary: Duration that impulse is spread over (triangular shaped).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseTorqueScale
member.summary: An impulse applied at a point on a body equivalent to an impulse at the center of the body and a torque. This parameter scales the torque component. (The torque component seems to be excite the rage looseness bug which sends the character in a sometimes wildly different direction to an applied impulse).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.LoosenessFix
member.summary: Fix the rage looseness bug by applying only the impulse at the center of the body unless it is a spine part then apply the twist component only of the torque as well.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseDelay
member.summary: Time from hit before impulses are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseReductionPerShot
member.summary: By how much are subsequent impulses reduced (e.g. 0.0: no reduction, 0.1: 10% reduction each new hit).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseRecovery
member.summary: Recovery rate of impulse strength per second (impulse strength from 0.0:1.0). At 60fps a impulseRecovery=60.0 will recover in 1 frame.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 60.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseMinLeakage
member.summary: The minimum amount of impulse leakage allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueMode
member.remarks: Default value = . If - proportional to character strength, can reduce impulse amount. If - no reduction of impulse and not proportional to character strength.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueSpinMode
member.remarks: Default value = . If a burst effect is achieved.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueFilterMode
member.remarks: Default value = .

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueAlwaysSpine3
member.summary: Always apply torques to spine3 instead of actual part hit.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueDelay
member.summary: Time from hit before torques are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorquePeriod
member.summary: Duration of torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueGain
member.summary: Multiplies impulse magnitude to arrive at torque that is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueCutoff
member.summary: Minimum ratio of impulse that remains after converting to torque (if in strength-proportional mode).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueReductionPerTick
member.summary: Ratio of torque for next tick (e.g. 1.0: not reducing over time, 0.9: each tick torque is reduced by 10%).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.LiftGain
member.summary: Amount of lift (directly multiplies torque axis to give lift force).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterImpulseDelay
member.summary: Time after impulse is applied that counter impulse is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterImpulseMag
member.summary: Amount of the original impulse that is countered.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterAfterMagReached
member.summary: Applies the counter impulse counterImpulseDelay(secs) after counterImpulseMag of the Impulse has been applied.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.DoCounterImpulse
member.summary: Add a counter impulse to the pelvis.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.CounterImpulse2Hips
member.summary: Amount of the counter impulse applied to hips - the rest is applied to the part originally hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseNoBalMult
member.summary: Amount to scale impulse by if the dynamicBalance is not OK. 1.0 means this functionality is not applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseBalStabStart
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseBalStabEnd
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseBalStabMult
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpineAngStart
member.summary: 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: Start GT End. This the dot of hip2Head with up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpineAngEnd
member.summary: 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: Start GT End. This the dot of hip2Head with up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpineAngMult
member.summary: 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseVelStart
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseVelEnd
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseVelMult
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirMult
member.summary: Amount to scale impulse by if the character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK and impulse is above impulseAirMultStart.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirMultStart
member.summary: If impulse is above this value scale it by impulseAirMult.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirMax
member.summary: Amount to clamp impulse to if character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirApplyAbove
member.summary: If impulse is above this amount then do not scale/clamp just let it through as is - it's a shotgun or cannon.
member.remarks: Default value = 399.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseAirOn
member.summary: Scale and/or clamp impulse if the character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegMult
member.summary: Amount to scale impulse by if the character is contacting with one foot only and dynamicBalance is OK and impulse is above impulseAirMultStart.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegMultStart
member.summary: If impulse is above this value scale it by impulseOneLegMult.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegMax
member.summary: Amount to clamp impulse to if character is contacting with one foot only and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegApplyAbove
member.summary: If impulse is above this amount then do not scale/clamp just let it through as is - it's a shotgun or cannon.
member.remarks: Default value = 399.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseOneLegOn
member.summary: Scale and/or clamp impulse if the character is contacting with one leg only and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbRatio
member.summary: 0.0 no rigidBody response, 0.5 half partForce half rigidBody, 1.0 = no partForce full rigidBody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbLowerShare
member.summary: Rigid body response is shared between the upper and lower body (rbUpperShare = 1-rbLowerShare). RbLowerShare=0.5 gives upper and lower share scaled by mass. i.e. if 70% ub mass and 30% lower mass then rbLowerShare=0.5 gives actualrbShare of 0.7ub and 0.3lb. rbLowerShare GT 0.5 scales the ub share down from 0.7 and the lb up from 0.3.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMoment
member.summary: 0.0 only force, 0.5 = force and half the rigid body moment applied, 1.0 = force and full rigidBody moment.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMaxTwistMomentArm
member.summary: Maximum twist arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMaxBroomMomentArm
member.summary: Maximum broom((everything but the twist) arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.summary: If Airborne: 0.0 no rigidBody response, 0.5 half partForce half rigidBody, 1.0 = no partForce full rigidBody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMomentAirborne
member.summary: If Airborne: 0.0 only force, 0.5 = force and half the rigid body moment applied, 1.0 = force and full rigidBody moment.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbMaxTwistMomentArmAirborne
member.summary: If Airborne: Maximum twist arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.summary: If Airborne: Maximum broom((everything but the twist) arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.summary: If only one leg in contact: 0.0 no rigidBody response, 0.5 half partForce half rigidBody, 1.0 = no partForce full rigidBody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.summary: If only one leg in contact: 0.0 only force, 0.5 = force and half the rigid body moment applied, 1.0 = force and full rigidBody moment.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

members.member: Default value = . .

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbPivot
member.summary: If false pivot around COM always, if true change pivot depending on foot contact: to feet center if both feet in contact, or foot position if 1 foot in contact or COM position if no feet in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper for sending a ConfigureBulletsExtra to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBulletsExtra to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseSpreadOverParts
member.summary: Spreads impulse across parts. Currently only for spine parts, not limbs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulsePeriod
member.summary: Duration that impulse is spread over (triangular shaped).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseTorqueScale
member.summary: An impulse applied at a point on a body equivalent to an impulse at the center of the body and a torque. This parameter scales the torque component. (The torque component seems to be excite the rage looseness bug which sends the character in a sometimes wildly different direction to an applied impulse).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.LoosenessFix
member.summary: Fix the rage looseness bug by applying only the impulse at the center of the body unless it is a spine part then apply the twist component only of the torque as well.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseDelay
member.summary: Time from hit before impulses are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueMode
member.remarks: Default value = . If - proportional to character strength, can reduce impulse amount. If - no reduction of impulse and not proportional to character strength.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueSpinMode
member.remarks: Default value = . If a burst effect is achieved.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueFilterMode
member.remarks: Default value = .

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueAlwaysSpine3
member.summary: Always apply torques to spine3 instead of actual part hit.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueDelay
member.summary: Time from hit before torques are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorquePeriod
member.summary: Duration of torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueGain
member.summary: Multiplies impulse magnitude to arrive at torque that is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueCutoff
member.summary: Minimum ratio of impulse that remains after converting to torque (if in strength-proportional mode).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.TorqueReductionPerTick
member.summary: Ratio of torque for next tick (e.g. 1.0: not reducing over time, 0.9: each tick torque is reduced by 10%).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.LiftGain
member.summary: Amount of lift (directly multiplies torque axis to give lift force).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.CounterImpulseDelay
member.summary: Time after impulse is applied that counter impulse is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.CounterImpulseMag
member.summary: Amount of the original impulse that is countered.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.CounterAfterMagReached
member.summary: Applies the counter impulse counterImpulseDelay(secs) after counterImpulseMag of the Impulse has been applied.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.DoCounterImpulse
member.summary: Add a counter impulse to the pelvis.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.CounterImpulse2Hips
member.summary: Amount of the counter impulse applied to hips - the rest is applied to the part originally hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseNoBalMult
member.summary: Amount to scale impulse by if the dynamicBalance is not OK. 1.0 means this functionality is not applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseBalStabStart
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseBalStabEnd
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseBalStabMult
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseBalStabMult*100% GT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseSpineAngStart
member.summary: 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: Start GT End. This the dot of hip2Head with up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseSpineAngEnd
member.summary: 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: Start GT End. This the dot of hip2Head with up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseSpineAngMult
member.summary: 100% GE Start to impulseSpineAngMult*100% LT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseVelStart
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseVelEnd
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: Start LT End.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseVelMult
member.summary: 100% LE Start to impulseVelMult*100% GT End. NB: leaving this as 1.0 means this functionality is not applied and Start and End have no effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseAirMult
member.summary: Amount to scale impulse by if the character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK and impulse is above impulseAirMultStart.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseAirMultStart
member.summary: If impulse is above this value scale it by impulseAirMult.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseAirMax
member.summary: Amount to clamp impulse to if character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseAirApplyAbove
member.summary: If impulse is above this amount then do not scale/clamp just let it through as is - it's a shotgun or cannon.
member.remarks: Default value = 399.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseAirOn
member.summary: Scale and/or clamp impulse if the character is airborne and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseOneLegMult
member.summary: Amount to scale impulse by if the character is contacting with one foot only and dynamicBalance is OK and impulse is above impulseAirMultStart.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseOneLegMultStart
member.summary: If impulse is above this value scale it by impulseOneLegMult.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseOneLegMax
member.summary: Amount to clamp impulse to if character is contacting with one foot only and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseOneLegApplyAbove
member.summary: If impulse is above this amount then do not scale/clamp just let it through as is - it's a shotgun or cannon.
member.remarks: Default value = 399.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseOneLegOn
member.summary: Scale and/or clamp impulse if the character is contacting with one leg only and dynamicBalance is OK.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.summary: 0.0 no rigidBody response, 0.5 half partForce half rigidBody, 1.0 = no partForce full rigidBody.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbPivot

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper
member.summary: Enable/disable/edit character limits in real time. This adjusts limits in RAGE-native space and will *not* reorient the joint.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureLimitsHelper for sending a ConfigureLimits to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureLimits to.
member.remarks: Enable/disable/edit character limits in real time. This adjusts limits in RAGE-native space and will *not* reorient the joint.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Mask
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value for joint limits to configure. Ignored if index != -1.
member.remarks: Default value = "fb".

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Enable
member.summary: If false, disable (set all to PI, -PI) limits.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.ToDesired
member.summary: If true, set limits to accommodate current desired angles.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Restore
member.summary: Return to cached defaults?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.ToCurAnimation
member.summary: If true, set limits to the current animated limits.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Index
member.summary: Index of effector to configure. Set to -1 to use mask.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Lean1
member.summary: Custom limit values to use if not setting limits to desired. Limits are RAGE-native, not NM-wrapper-native.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Lean2
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Twist
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Margin
member.summary: Joint limit margin to add to current animation limits when using those to set runtime limits.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureSoftLimitHelper for sending a ConfigureSoftLimit to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureSoftLimit to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Index
member.summary: Select limb that the soft limit is going to be applied to.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of the soft limit. Parameter is used to calculate spring term that contributes to the desired acceleration.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 30.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Damping
member.summary: Damping of the soft limit. Parameter is used to calculate damper term that contributes to the desired acceleration. To have the system critically dampened set it to 1.0.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.9f. Max value = 1.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.LimitAngle
member.summary: Soft limit angle. Positive angle in RAD, measured relatively either from hard limit maxAngle (approach direction = -1) or minAngle (approach direction = 1). This angle will be clamped if outside the joint hard limit range.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.ApproachDirection
member.summary: Limit angle can be measured relatively to joints hard limit minAngle or maxAngle. Set it to +1 to measure soft limit angle relatively to hard limit minAngle that corresponds to the maximum stretch of the elbow. Set it to -1 to measure soft limit angle relatively to hard limit maxAngle that corresponds to the maximum stretch of the knee.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = -1. Max value = 1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.VelocityScaled
member.summary: Scale stiffness based on character angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper
member.summary: This single message allows you to configure the injured arm reaction during shot.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper for sending a ConfigureShotInjuredArm to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureShotInjuredArm to.
member.remarks: This single message allows you to configure the injured arm reaction during shot.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.InjuredArmTime
member.summary: Length of the reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.HipYaw
member.summary: Amount of hip twist. (Negative values twist into bullet direction - probably not what is wanted).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.HipRoll
member.summary: Amount of hip roll.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.ForceStepExtraHeight
member.summary: Additional height added to stepping foot.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.7f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.ForceStep
member.summary: Force a step to be taken whether pushed out of balance or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.StepTurn
member.summary: Turn the character using the balancer.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelMultiplierStart
member.summary: Start velocity where parameters begin to be ramped down to zero linearly.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelMultiplierEnd
member.summary: End velocity of ramp where parameters are scaled to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelForceStep
member.summary: Velocity above which a step is not forced.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelStepTurn
member.summary: Velocity above which a stepTurn is not asked for.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelScales
member.summary: Use the velocity scaling parameters. Tune for standing still then use velocity scaling to make sure a running character stays balanced (the turning tends to make the character fall over more at speed).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper
member.summary: This single message allows you to configure the injured leg reaction during shot.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper for sending a ConfigureShotInjuredLeg to a given .
member.param: The to send the ConfigureShotInjuredLeg to.
member.remarks: This single message allows you to configure the injured leg reaction during shot.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.TimeBeforeCollapseWoundLeg
member.summary: Time before a wounded leg is set to be weak and cause the character to collapse.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegInjuryTime
member.summary: Leg injury duration (reaction to being shot in leg).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegForceStep
member.summary: Force a step to be taken whether pushed out of balance or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegLimpBend
member.summary: Bend the legs via the balancer by this amount if stepping on the injured leg. 0.2 seems a good default.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegLiftTime
member.summary: Leg lift duration (reaction to being shot in leg). (Lifting happens when not stepping with other leg).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegInjury
member.summary: Leg injury - leg strength is reduced.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegInjuryHipPitch
member.summary: Leg injury bend forwards amount when not lifting leg.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegInjuryLiftHipPitch
member.summary: Leg injury bend forwards amount when lifting leg. (Lifting happens when not stepping with other leg).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegInjurySpineBend
member.summary: Leg injury bend forwards amount when not lifting leg.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredLegHelper.LegInjuryLiftSpineBend
member.summary: Leg injury bend forwards amount when lifting leg. (Lifting happens when not stepping with other leg).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.summary: The sink rate (higher for a faster drop).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.LastStandHorizDamping
member.summary: Higher values for more damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.LastStandMaxTime
member.summary: Max time allowed in last stand mode.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TurnTowardsBullets
member.summary: Use cheat torques to face the direction of bullets if not facing too far away.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.VelocityBased
member.summary: Make strength of constraint function of COM velocity. Uses -1 for forceDamping if the damping is positive.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueOnlyInAir
member.summary: Only apply torque based constraint when airBorne.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceStrength
member.summary: Strength of constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceDamping
member.summary: Damping in constraint: -1 makes it scale automagically with forceStrength. Other negative values will scale this automagic damping.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 50.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceFeetMult
member.summary: Multiplier to the force applied to the feet.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceSpine3Share
member.summary: Share of pelvis force applied to spine3.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceLeanReduction
member.summary: How much the character lean is taken into account when reducing the force.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceInAirShare
member.summary: Share of the feet force to the airborne foot.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceMin
member.summary: When min and max are greater than 0 the constraint strength is determined from character strength, scaled into the range given by min and max.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceMax
member.summary: See above.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceSaturationVel
member.summary: When in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity at which constraint reaches maximum strength (forceStrength).
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceThresholdVel
member.summary: When in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity above which constraint starts applying forces.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueStrength
member.summary: Strength of torque based constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueDamping
member.summary: Damping of torque based constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueSaturationVel
member.summary: When in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity at which constraint reaches maximum strength (torqueStrength).
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueThresholdVel
member.summary: When in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity above which constraint starts applying torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.SupportPosition
member.summary: Distance the foot is behind Com projection that is still considered able to generate the support for the upright constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.NoSupportForceMult
member.summary: Still apply this fraction of the upright constaint force if the foot is not in a position (defined by supportPosition) to generate the support for the upright constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.StepUpHelp
member.summary: Strength of cheat force applied upwards to spine3 to help the character up steps/slopes.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.StayUpAcc
member.summary: How much the cheat force takes into account the acceleration of moving platforms.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.StayUpAccMax
member.summary: The maximum floorAcceleration (of a moving platform) that the cheat force takes into account.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper
member.summary: Sets the type of reaction if catchFall is called.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetFallingReactionHelper for sending a SetFallingReaction to a given .
member.param: The to send the SetFallingReaction to.
member.remarks: Sets the type of reaction if catchFall is called.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HandsAndKnees
member.summary: Set to true to get handsAndKnees catchFall if catchFall called. If true allows the dynBalancer to stay on during the catchfall and modifies the catch fall to give a more alive looking performance (hands and knees for front landing or sitting up for back landing).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.CallRDS
member.summary: If true catchFall will call rollDownstairs if comVel GT comVelRDSThresh - prevents excessive sliding in catchFall. Was previously only true for handsAndKnees.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ComVelRDSThresh
member.summary: ComVel above which rollDownstairs will start - prevents excessive sliding in catchFall.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ResistRolling
member.summary: For rds catchFall only: True to resist rolling motion (rolling motion is set off by ub contact and a sliding velocity), false to allow more of a continuous rolling (rolling motion is set off at a sliding velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ArmReduceSpeed
member.summary: Strength is reduced in the catchFall when the arms contact the ground. 0.2 is good for handsAndKnees. 2.5 is good for normal catchFall, anything lower than 1.0 for normal catchFall may lead to bad catchFall poses.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ReachLengthMultiplier
member.summary: Reach length multiplier that scales characters arm topological length, value in range from (0, 1 GT where 1.0 means reach length is maximum.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.InhibitRollingTime
member.summary: Time after hitting ground that the catchFall can call rds.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ChangeFrictionTime
member.summary: Time after hitting ground that the catchFall can change the friction of parts to inhibit sliding.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.GroundFriction
member.summary: 8.0 was used on yanked) Friction multiplier on body parts when on ground. Character can look too slidy with groundFriction = 1. Higher values give a more jerky reaction but this seems timestep dependent especially for dragged by the feet.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.FrictionMin
member.summary: Min Friction of an impact with a body part (not head, hands or feet) - to increase friction of slippy environment to get character to roll better. Applied in catchFall and rollUp(rollDownStairs).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.FrictionMax
member.summary: Max Friction of an impact with a body part (not head, hands or feet) - to increase friction of slippy environment to get character to roll better. Applied in catchFall and rollUp(rollDownStairs).
member.remarks: Default value = 9999.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StopOnSlopes
member.summary: Apply tactics to help stop on slopes.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StopManual
member.summary: Override slope value to manually force stopping on flat ground. Encourages character to come to rest face down or face up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StoppedStrengthDecay
member.summary: Speed at which strength reduces when stopped.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.SpineLean1Offset
member.summary: Bias spine post towards hunched (away from arched).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.RiflePose
member.summary: Hold rifle in a safe position to reduce complications with collision. Only applied if holding a rifle.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HkHeadAvoid
member.summary: Enable head ground avoidance when handsAndKnees is true.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.AntiPropClav
member.summary: Discourage the character getting stuck propped up by elbows when falling backwards - by inhibiting backwards moving clavicles (keeps the arms slightly wider).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.AntiPropWeak
member.summary: Discourage the character getting stuck propped up by elbows when falling backwards - by weakening the arms as soon they hit the floor. (Also stops the hands lifting up when flat on back).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HeadAsWeakAsArms
member.summary: Head weakens as arms weaken. If false and antiPropWeak when falls onto back doesn't loosen neck so early (matches bodyStrength instead).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.SuccessStrength
member.summary: When bodyStrength is less than successStrength send a success feedback - DO NOT GO OUTSIDE MIN/MAX PARAMETER VALUES OTHERWISE NO SUCCESS FEEDBACK WILL BE SENT.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper for sending a SetCharacterUnderwater to a given .
member.param: The to send the SetCharacterUnderwater to.
member.remarks: Sets viscosity applied to damping limbs.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Underwater
member.summary: Is character underwater?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Viscosity
member.summary: Viscosity applied to character's parts.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.GravityFactor
member.summary: Gravity factor applied to character.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Stroke
member.summary: Swimming force applied to character as a function of handVelocity and footVelocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1000.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.LinearStroke
member.summary: Swimming force (linearStroke=true,False) = (f(v),f(v*v)).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper

member.remarks: SetCharacterCollisions:.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.Spin
member.summary: Sliding friction turned into spin 80.0 (used in demo videos) good for rest of default params below. If 0.0 then no collision enhancement.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.MaxVelocity
member.summary: Torque = spin*(relative velocity) up to this maximum for relative velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToAll
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToSpine
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToThighs
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToClavicles
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToUpperArms
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.FootSlip
member.summary: Allow foot slipping if collided.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.VehicleClass
member.summary: ClassType of the object against which to enhance the collision. All character vehicle interaction (e.g. braceForImpact glancing spins) relies on this value so EDIT WISELY. If it is used for things other than vehicles then NM should be informed.
member.remarks: Default value = 15. Min value = 0. Max value = 100.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper
member.summary: Damp out cartwheeling and somersaulting above a certain threshold.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetCharacterDampingHelper for sending a SetCharacterDamping to a given .
member.param: The to send the SetCharacterDamping to.
member.remarks: Damp out cartwheeling and somersaulting above a certain threshold.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.SomersaultThresh
member.summary: Somersault AngularMomentum measure above which we start damping - try 34.0. Falling over straight backwards gives 54 on hitting ground.
member.remarks: Default value = 34.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.SomersaultDamp
member.summary: Amount to damp somersaulting by (spinning around left/right axis) - try 0.45.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.CartwheelThresh
member.summary: Cartwheel AngularMomentum measure above which we start damping - try 27.0.
member.remarks: Default value = 27.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.CartwheelDamp
member.summary: Amount to damp somersaulting by (spinning around front/back axis) - try 0.8.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.VehicleCollisionTime
member.summary: Time after impact with a vehicle to apply characterDamping. -ve values mean always apply whether collided with vehicle or not. =0.0 never apply. =timestep apply for only that frame. A typical roll from being hit by a car lasts about 4secs.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.V2
member.summary: If true damping is proportional to Angular momentum squared. If false proportional to Angular momentum.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.summary: Stiffness of masked joints. -ve values mean don't apply stiffness or damping (just use defaults or ones applied by behaviors). If you are using animpose fullbody on its own then this gives the opprtunity to use setStffness and setMuscle stiffness messages to set up the character's muscles. Mmmmtodo get rid of this -ve.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.Damping
member.summary: Damping of masked joints.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.EffectorMask
member.summary: Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation).

member.summary: Stiffness applied to left leg (applied after stiffness). If -ve then not applied (use current setting).
