member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxTime
member.summary: Duration of arms relax following firing weapon. NB:This is clamped (0,5) in pointGun.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxAmount
member.summary: Relax multiplier following firing weapon. Recovers over relaxTime.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxDistance
member.summary: Range of motion for ik-based recoil.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseIncomingTransforms
member.summary: Use the incoming transforms to inform the pointGun of the primaryWeaponDistance, poleVector for the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MeasureParentOffset
member.summary: If useIncomingTransforms = true and measureParentOffset=true then measure the Pointing-from offset from parent effector, using itms - this should point the barrel of the gun to the target. This is added to the rightHandParentOffset. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentOffset
member.summary: Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentEffector
member.summary: 1 = Use leftShoulder. Effector from which the left hand pointing originates. Ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1. Max value = 21.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentOffset
member.summary: Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down. This is added to the measured one if useIncomingTransforms=true and measureParentOffset=true. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0. Pistol(0,0,0) Rifle(0.0032, 0.0, -0.0).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentEffector
member.summary: 1 = Use rightShoulder.. Effector from which the right hand pointing originates. Ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1. Max value = 21.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PrimaryHandWeaponDistance
member.summary: Distance from the shoulder to hold the weapon. If -1 and useIncomingTransforms then weaponDistance is read from ITMs. WeaponDistance=primaryHandWeaponDistance clamped [0.2f:m_maxArmReach=0.65] if useIncomingTransforms = false. pistol 0.60383, rifle 0.336.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConstrainRifle
member.summary: Use hard constraint to keep rifle stock against shoulder?.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RifleConstraintMinDistance
member.summary: Rifle constraint distance. Deliberately kept large to create a flat constraint surface where rifle meets the shoulder.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableArmCollisions
member.summary: Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and the torso/legs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableRifleCollisions
member.summary: Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and spine3/spine2 if in rifle mode.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper
member.summary: Seldom set parameters for pointGun - just to keep number of parameters in any message less than or equal to 64.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the PointGunExtraHelper for sending a PointGunExtra to a given .

member.remarks: Seldom set parameters for pointGun - just to keep number of parameters in any message less than or equal to 64.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.ConstraintStrength
member.summary: For supportConstraint = 2: force constraint strength of the supporting hands - it gets shaky at about 4.0.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.ConstraintThresh
member.summary: For supportConstraint = 2: Like makeConstraintDistance. Force starts acting when the hands are LT 3.0*thresh apart but is maximum strength LT thresh. For comparison: 0.1 is used for reachForWound in shot, 0.25 is used in grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.WeaponMask
member.summary: Currently unused - no intoWorldTest. RAGE bit mask to exclude weapons from ray probe - currently defaults to MP3 weapon flag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1024. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.TimeWarpActive
member.summary: Is timeWarpActive enabled?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.TimeWarpStrengthScale
member.summary: Scale for arm and helper strength when timewarp is enabled. 1 = normal compensation.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.OriStiff
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller stiffness.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.OriDamp
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.PosStiff
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller stiffness.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.PosDamp
member.summary: Hand stabilization controller damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the RollDownStairsHelper for sending a RollDownStairs to a given .
member.param: The to send the RollDownStairs to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Effector Stiffness. Value feeds through to rollUp directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Damping
member.summary: Effector Damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Forcemag
member.summary: Helper force strength. Do not go above 1 for a rollDownStairs/roll along ground reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_useArmToSlowDown
member.summary: The degree to which the character will try to stop a barrel roll with his arms.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.9f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseZeroPose
member.summary: Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.SpinWhenInAir
member.summary: Applied cheat forces to spin the character when in the air, the forces are 40% of the forces applied when touching the ground. Be careful little bunny rabbits, the character could spin unnaturally in the air.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_armReachAmount
member.summary: How much the character reaches with his arms to brace against the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_legPush
member.summary: Amount that the legs push outwards when tumbling.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TryToAvoidHeadButtingGround
member.summary: Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ArmReachLength
member.summary: The length that the arm reaches and so how much it straightens.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.CustomRollDir
member.summary: Pass in a custom direction in to have the character try and roll in that direction.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f). Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseCustomRollDir
member.summary: Pass in true to use the customRollDir parameter.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTarget
member.summary: The target linear velocity used to start the rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTime
member.summary: Time, in seconds, to decay stiffness down to the stiffnessDecayTarget value (or -1 to disable).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.AsymmetricalLegs
member.summary: 0 is no leg asymmetry in 'foetal' position. greater than 0 a asymmetricalLegs-rand(30%), added/minus each joint of the legs in radians. Random number changes about once every roll. 0.4 gives a lot of asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ZAxisSpinReduction
member.summary: Tries to reduce the spin around the z axis. Scale 0 - 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocityDecayTime
member.summary: Time for the targetlinearVelocity to decay to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocity
member.summary: Helper torques are applied to match the spin of the character to the max of targetLinearVelocity and COMVelMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.OnlyApplyHelperForces
member.summary: Don't use rollup if true.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseVelocityOfObjectBelow
member.summary: Scale applied cheat forces/torques to (zero) if object underneath character has velocity greater than 1.f.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseRelativeVelocity
member.summary: UseVelocityOfObjectBelow uses a relative velocity of the character to the object underneath.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyFoetalToLegs
member.summary: If true, use rollup for upper body and a kind of foetal behavior for legs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MovementLegsInFoetalPosition
member.summary: Only used if applyFoetalToLegs = true : define the variation of angles for the joints of the legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MaxAngVelAroundFrontwardAxis
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques or applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : maximal angular velocity around frontward axis of the pelvis to apply cheating torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MinAngVel
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques or applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : minimal angular velocity of the roll to apply cheating torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyNewRollingCheatingTorques
member.summary: If true will use the new way to apply cheating torques (like in fallOverWall), otherwise will use the old way.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MaxAngVel
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques defined to true : maximal angular velocity of the roll to apply cheating torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MagOfTorqueToRoll
member.summary: Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques defined to true : magnitude of the torque to roll down the stairs.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 500.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyHelPerTorqueToAlign
member.summary: Apply torque to align the body orthogonally to the direction of the roll.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.DelayToAlignBody
member.summary: Only used if applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : delay to start to apply torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MagOfTorqueToAlign
member.summary: Only used if applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : magnitude of the torque to align orthogonally the body.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 500.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.AirborneReduction
member.summary: Ordinarily keep at 0.85. Make this lower if you want spinning in the air.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyMinMaxFriction
member.summary: Pass-through to Roll Up. Controls whether or not behavior enforces min/max friction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.LimitSpinReduction
member.summary: Scale zAxisSpinReduction back when rotating end-over-end (somersault) to give the body a chance to align with the axis of rotation.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialNeckRampDuration
member.summary: Duration of the ramp to bring the neck stiffness/damping back to normal levels.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.UseCStrModulation

member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrLowerMax
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.DeathTime

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.BodyPart

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: If true then normal and hitPoint should be supplied in local coordinates of bodyPart. If false then normal and hitPoint should be supplied in World coordinates.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.Normal

member.summary: Position of impact on character. Can be local or global depending on localHitPointInfo.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.BulletVel
member.summary: Bullet velocity in world coordinates.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -2000.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotSnapHelper for sending a ShotSnap to a given .

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.Snap
member.summary: Add a Snap to shot.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMag
member.summary: The magnitude of the reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMovingMult
member.summary: MovingMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapBalancingMult
member.summary: BalancingMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if balancing = (not lying on the floor/ not upper body not collided) and not airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapAirborneMult
member.summary: AirborneMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMovingThresh
member.summary: If moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh then mvingMult applied to stunMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapDirectionRandomness
member.summary: The character snaps in a prescribed way (decided by bullet direction) - Higher the value the more random this direction is.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.summary: Snap the rightLeg.

member.summary: Snap the spine.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapNeck
member.summary: Snap the neck.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapPhasedLegs

member.summary: Legs are either in phase with each other or not.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.UnSnapInterval
member.summary: Interval before applying reverse snap.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.UnSnapRatio
member.summary: The magnitude of the reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapUseTorques

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper
member.summary: Configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotShockSpinHelper for sending a ShotShockSpin to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotShockSpin to.
member.remarks: Configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AddShockSpin
member.summary: If enabled, add a short 'shock' of torque to the character's spine to exaggerate bullet impact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.RandomizeShockSpinDirection
member.summary: For use with close-range shotgun blasts, or similar.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AlwaysAddShockSpin
member.summary: If true, apply the shock spin no matter which body component was hit. Otherwise only apply if the spine or clavicles get hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMin
member.summary: Minimum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMax
member.summary: Maximum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinLiftForceMult
member.summary: If greater than 0, apply a force to lift the character up while the torque is applied, trying to produce a dramatic spun/twist shotgun-to-the-chest effect. This is a scale of the torque applied, so 8.0 or so would give a reasonable amount of lift.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinDecayMult
member.summary: Multiplier used when decaying torque spin over time.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScalePerComponent
member.summary: Torque applied is scaled by this amount across the spine components - spine2 recieving the full amount, then 3 and 1 and finally 0. Each time, this value is used to scale it down. 0.5 means half the torque each time.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMaxTwistVel
member.summary: Shock spin ends when twist velocity is greater than this value (try 6.0). If set to -1 does not stop.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScaleByLeverArm
member.summary: Shock spin scales by lever arm of bullet i.e. bullet impact point to center line.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinAirMult
member.summary: ShockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when both the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpin1FootMult
member.summary: ShockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when the one of the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinFootGripMult
member.summary: ShockSpin scales the torques applied to the feet by footSlipCompensation.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.BracedSideSpinMult
member.summary: If shot on a side with a forward foot and both feet are on the ground and balanced, increase the shockspin to compensate for the balancer naturally resisting spin to that side.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper
member.summary: Configure the fall to knees shot.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)

member.remarks: Configure the fall to knees shot.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FallToKnees
member.summary: Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkAlwaysChangeFall
member.summary: Always change fall behavior. If false only change when falling forward.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceTime
member.summary: How long the balancer runs for before fallToKnees starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForce
member.summary: Hip helper force magnitude - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes.
member.remarks: Default value = 200.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForceOnSpine
member.summary: Helper force applied to spine3 as well.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLeanHelp
member.summary: Help balancer lean amount - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes. Half of this is also applied as hipLean.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkSpineBend
member.summary: Bend applied to spine when falling from knees. (+ve forward - try -0.1) (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -0.2f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkStiffSpine
member.summary: Stiffen spine when falling from knees (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLooseness
member.summary: Looseness (muscleStiffness = 1.01f - m_parameters.ftkImpactLooseness) applied to upperBody on knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLoosenessTime
member.summary: Time that looseness is applied after knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBendRate
member.summary: Rate at which the legs are bent to go from standing to on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipBlend
member.summary: Blend from current hip to balancing on knees hip angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLungeProb
member.summary: Probability that a lunge reaction will be allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkKneeSpin
member.summary: When on knees allow some spinning of the character. If false then the balancers' footSlipCompensation remains on and tends to keep the character facing the same way as when it was balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFricMult
member.summary: Multiplier on the reduction of friction for the feet based on angle away from horizontal - helps the character fall to knees quicker.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipAngleFall
member.summary: Apply this hip angle when the character starts to fall backwards when on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchForwards
member.summary: Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling forwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchBackwards
member.summary: Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling backwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFallBelowStab
member.summary: Balancer instability below which the character starts to bend legs even if it isn't going to fall on to it's knees (i.e. if going backwards). 0.3 almost ensures a fall to knees but means the character will keep stepping backward until it slows down enough.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceAbortThreshold
member.summary: When the character gives up and goes into a fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkOnKneesArmType
member.summary: Type of arm response when on knees falling forward 0=useFallArms (from RollDownstairs or catchFall), 1= armsIn, 2=armsOut.
member.remarks: Default value = 2. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleaseReachForWound
member.summary: Release the reachForWound this amount of time after the knees have hit. If LT 0.0 then keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReachForWound
member.summary: True = Keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state. false = respect the shotConfigureArms params: reachFalling, reachFallingWithOneHand, reachOnFloor.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleasePointGun
member.summary: Override the pointGun when knees hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFailMustCollide
member.summary: The upper body of the character must be colliding and other failure conditions met to fail.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Brace
member.summary: Blind brace with arms if appropriate.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.PointGun
member.summary: Point gun if appropriate.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.UseArmsWindmill
member.summary: ArmsWindmill if going backwards fast enough.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReleaseWound
member.summary: Release wound if going sideways/forward fast enough. 0 = don't. 1 = only if bracing. 2 = any default arm reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachFalling
member.summary: Reach for wound when falling. 0 = false, 1 = true, 2 = once per shot performance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachFallingWithOneHand
member.summary: Force character to reach for wound with only one hand when falling or fallen. 0 = allow two-handed reach, 1 = left only if two-handed possible, 2 = right only if two-handed possible, 3 = one handed but automatic (allows switching of hands).
member.remarks: Default value = 3. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachOnFloor
member.summary: ReachForWound when on floor - 0 = false, 1 = true, 2 = once per shot performance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AlwaysReachTime
member.summary: Inhibit arms brace for this amount of time after reachForWound has begun.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AWSpeedMult
member.summary: For armsWindmill, multiplier on character speed - increase of speed of circling is proportional to character speed (max speed of circliing increase = 1.5). Eg. lowering the value increases the range of velocity that the 0-1.5 is applied over.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AWRadiusMult
member.summary: For armsWindmill, multiplier on character speed - increase of radii is proportional to character speed (max radius increase = 0.45). E.g. lowering the value increases the range of velocity that the 0-0.45 is applied over.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AWStiffnessAdd
member.summary: For armsWindmill, added arm stiffness ranges from 0 to AWStiffnessAdd.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachWithOneHand
member.summary: Force character to reach for wound with only one hand. 0 = allow two-handed reach, 1 = left only if two-handed possible, 2 = right only if two-handed possible.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AllowLeftPistolRFW
member.summary: Allow character to reach for wound with left hand if holding a pistol. It never will for a rifle. If pointGun is running this will only happen if the hand cannot point and pointGun:poseUnusedGunArm = false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AllowRightPistolRFW
member.summary: Allow character to reach for wound with right hand if holding a pistol. It never will for a rifle. If pointGun is running this will only happen if the hand cannot point and pointGun:poseUnusedGunArm = false.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.RfwWithPistol
member.summary: Override pointGun and reachForWound if desired if holding a pistol. It never will for a rifle.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2
member.summary: Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2Left
member.summary: Fling the left arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2Right
member.summary: Fling the right arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2OverrideStagger
member.summary: Override stagger arms even if staggerFall:m_upperBodyReaction = true.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2TimeBefore
member.summary: Time after hit that the fling will start (allows for a bit of loose arm movement from bullet impact.snap etc).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2Time
member.summary: Duration of the fling behavior.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2MStiffL
member.summary: Muscle stiffness of the left arm. If negative then uses the shots underlying muscle stiffness from controlStiffness (i.e. respects looseness).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2MStiffR
member.summary: Muscle stiffness of the right arm. If negative then uses the shots underlying muscle stiffness from controlStiffness (i.e. respects looseness).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2RelaxTimeL
member.summary: Maximum time before the left arm relaxes in the fling. It will relax automatically when the arm has completed it's bent arm fling. This is what causes the arm to straighten.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2RelaxTimeR
member.summary: Maximum time before the right arm relaxes in the fling. It will relax automatically when the arm has completed it's bent arm fling. This is what causes the arm to straighten.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMinL
member.summary: Minimum fling angle for left arm. Fling angle is random in the range fling2AngleMin:fling2AngleMax. Angle of fling in radians measured from the body horizontal sideways from shoulder. Positive is up, 0 shoulder level, negative down.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.5f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMaxL
member.summary: Maximum fling angle for left arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMinR
member.summary: Minimum fling angle for right arm.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.5f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMaxR
member.summary: Maximum fling angle for right arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMinL
member.summary: Minimum left arm length. Arm length is random in the range fling2LengthMin:fling2LengthMax. Arm length maps one to one with elbow angle. These values are scaled internally for the female character.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMaxL
member.summary: Maximum left arm length.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMinR
member.summary: Min right arm length.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMaxR
member.summary: Max right arm length.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Bust
member.summary: Has the character got a bust. If so then cupBust (move bust reach targets below bust) or bustElbowLift and cupSize (stop upperArm penetrating bust and move bust targets to surface of bust) are implemented.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.BustElbowLift
member.summary: Lift the elbows up this much extra to avoid upper arm penetrating the bust (when target hits spine2 or spine3).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.CupSize
member.summary: Amount reach target to bust (spine2) will be offset forward by.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.CupBust
member.summary: All reach targets above or on the bust will cause a reach below the bust. (specifically moves spine3 and spine2 targets to spine1). BustElbowLift and cupSize are ignored.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper
member.summary: Clone of High Fall with a wider range of operating conditions.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SmartFallHelper for sending a SmartFall to a given .
member.param: The to send the SmartFall to.
member.remarks: Clone of High Fall with a wider range of operating conditions.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of body. Value feeds through to bodyBalance (synced with defaults), to armsWindmill (14 for this value at default ), legs pedal, head look and roll down stairs directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Bodydamping
member.summary: The damping of the joints.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Catchfalltime
member.summary: The length of time before the impact that the character transitions to the landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.CrashOrLandCutOff
member.summary: 0.52angle is 0.868 dot//A threshold for deciding how far away from upright the character needs to be before bailing out (going into a foetal) instead of trying to land (keeping stretched out). NB: never does bailout if ignorWorldCollisions true.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.PdStrength
member.summary: Strength of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.PdDamping
member.summary: Damping multiplier of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical. The actual damping is pdDamping*pdStrength*constant*angVel.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmAngSpeed
member.summary: Arm circling speed in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmAmplitude
member.summary: In armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmPhase
member.summary: In armWindMillAdaptive 3.1 opposite for stuntman. 1.0 old default. 0.0 in phase.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmBendElbows
member.summary: In armWindMillAdaptive bend the elbows as a function of armAngle. For stunt man true otherwise false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegRadius
member.summary: Radius of legs on pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegAngSpeed
member.summary: In pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegAsymmetry
member.summary: 0.0 for stunt man. Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronize the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Arms2LegsPhase
member.summary: Phase angle between the arms and legs circling angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.5f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Arms2LegsSync
member.summary: Syncs the arms angle to what the leg angle is.
member.remarks: Default value = . All speed/direction parameters of armswindmill are overwritten if = . If and you want synced arms/legs then armAngSpeed=legAngSpeed, legAsymmetry = 0.0 (to stop randomizations of the leg cicle speed).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmsUp
member.summary: Where to put the arms when preparing to land. Approx 1 = above head, 0 = head height, -1 = down. LT -2.0 use catchFall arms, LT -3.0 use prepare for landing pose if Agent is due to land vertically, feet first.
member.remarks: Default value = -3.1f. Min value = -4.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.OrientateBodyToFallDirection
member.summary: Toggle to orientate to fall direction. i.e. orientate so that the character faces the horizontal velocity direction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.OrientateTwist
member.summary: If false don't worry about the twist angle of the character when orientating the character. If false this allows the twist axis of the character to be free (You can get a nice twisting highFall like the one in dieHard 4 when the car goes into the helicopter).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.OrientateMax
member.summary: DEVEL parameter - suggest you don't edit it. Maximum torque the orientation controller can apply. If 0 then no helper torques will be used. 300 will orientate the character softly for all but extreme angles away from aimAngleBase. If abs (current -aimAngleBase) is getting near 3.0 then this can be reduced to give a softer feel.
member.remarks: Default value = 300.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.AlanRickman
member.summary: If true then orientate the character to face the point from where it started falling. High fall like the one in "Die Hard" with Alan Rickman.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FowardRoll
member.summary: Try to execute a forward Roll on landing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.UseZeroPose_withFowardRoll
member.summary: Blend to a zero pose when forward roll is attempted.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.AimAngleBase
member.summary: Angle from vertical the pdController is driving to (positive = forwards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -3.1f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FowardVelRotation
member.summary: Scale to add/subtract from aimAngle based on forward speed (Internal).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FootVelCompScale
member.summary: Scale to change to amount of vel that is added to the foot ik from the velocity (Internal).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.SideD
member.summary: Sideoffset for the feet during prepareForLanding. +ve = right.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FowardOffsetOfLegIK
member.summary: Forward offset for the feet during prepareForLanding.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegL
member.summary: Leg Length for ik (Internal)//unused.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.CatchFallCutOff
member.summary: 0.5angle is 0.878 dot. Cutoff to go to the catchFall (internal) //mmmtodo do like crashOrLandCutOff.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegStrength
member.summary: Strength of the legs at landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Balance
member.summary: If true have enough strength to balance. If false not enough strength in legs to balance (even though bodyBlance called).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.IgnorWorldCollisions
member.summary: Never go into bailout (foetal).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.AdaptiveCircling
member.summary: Stunt man type fall. Arm and legs circling direction controlled by angmom and orientation.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Hula
member.summary: With stunt man type fall. Hula reaction if can't see floor and not rotating fast.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.MaxSpeedForRecoverableFall
member.summary: Character needs to be moving less than this speed to consider fall as a recoverable one.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.MinSpeedForBrace
member.summary: Character needs to be moving at least this fast horizontally to start bracing for impact if there is an object along its trajectory.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LandingNormal
member.summary: Ray-cast normal doted with up direction has to be greater than this number to consider object flat enough to land on it.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsForceMag
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsTargetLinVeDecayTime
member.summary: RDS: Time for the targetlinearVelocity to decay to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsTargetLinearVelocity
member.summary: RDS: Helper torques are applied to match the spin of the character to the max of targetLinearVelocity and COMVelMag. -1 to use initial character velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 30.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsUseStartingFriction
member.summary: Start Catch Fall/RDS state with specified friction. Catch fall will overwrite based on setFallingReaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsStartingFriction
member.summary: Catch Fall/RDS starting friction. Catch fall will overwrite based on setFallingReaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsStartingFrictionMin
member.summary: Catch Fall/RDS starting friction minimum. Catch fall will overwrite based on setFallingReaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsForceVelThreshold
member.summary: Velocity threshold under which RDS force mag will be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.InitialState
member.summary: Force initial state (used in vehicle bail out to start SF_CatchFall (6) earlier.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 7.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ChangeExtremityFriction
member.summary: Allow friction changes to be applied to the hands and feet.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Teeter
member.summary: Set up an immediate teeter in the direction of trave if initial state is SF_Balance.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.TeeterOffset
member.summary: Offset the default Teeter edge in the direction of travel. Will need to be tweaked depending on how close to the real edge AI tends to trigger the behavior.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.StopRollingTime
member.summary: Time in seconds before ped should start actively trying to stop rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ReboundScale
member.summary: Scale for rebound assistance. 0 = off, 1 = very bouncy, 2 = jbone crazy.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ReboundMask
member.summary: Part mask to apply rebound assistance.
member.remarks: Default value = uk.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ForceHeadAvoid
member.summary: Force head avoid to be active during Catch Fall even when character is not on the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.CfZAxisSpinReduction
member.summary: Pass-through parameter for Catch Fall spin reduction. Increase to stop more spin. 0..1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.SplatWhenStopped
member.summary: Transition to splat state when com vel is below value, regardless of character health or fall velocity. Set to zero to disable.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.BlendHeadWhenStopped
member.summary: Blend head to neutral pose com vel approaches zero. Linear between zero and value. Set to zero to disable.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.SpreadLegs
member.summary: Spread legs amount for pedal during fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the StaggerFallHelper for sending a StaggerFall to a given .
member.param: The to send the StaggerFall to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Stiffness of arms. Catch_fall's stiffness scales with this value, but has default values when this is default.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Sets damping value for the arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineDamping
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineStiffness
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmStiffnessStart
member.summary: ArmStiffness during the yanked timescale i.e. timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmDampingStart
member.summary: ArmDamping during the yanked timescale i.e. timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineDampingStart
member.summary: SpineDamping during the yanked timescale i.e. timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineStiffnessStart
member.summary: SpineStiffness during the yanked timescale i.e. timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TimeAtStartValues
member.summary: Time spent with Start values for arms and spine stiffness and damping i.e. for whiplash effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.RampTimeFromStartValues
member.summary: Time spent ramping from Start to end values for arms and spine stiffness and damping i.e. for whiplash effect (occurs after timeAtStartValues).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.StaggerStepProb
member.summary: Probability per step of time spent in a stagger step.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.StepsTillStartEnd
member.summary: Steps taken before lowerBodyStiffness starts ramping down by perStepReduction1.
member.remarks: Default value = 2. Min value = 0. Max value = 100.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TimeStartEnd
member.summary: Time from start of behavior before lowerBodyStiffness starts ramping down for rampTimeToEndValues to endValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.RampTimeToEndValues
member.summary: Time spent ramping from lowerBodyStiffness to lowerBodyStiffnessEnd.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LowerBodyStiffness
member.summary: LowerBodyStiffness should be 12.
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LowerBodyStiffnessEnd
member.summary: LowerBodyStiffness at end.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.PredictionTime
member.summary: Amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to step to. Bigger values try to recover with fewer, bigger steps. Smaller values recover with smaller steps, and generally recover less.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.PerStepReduction1
member.summary: LowerBody stiffness will be reduced every step to make the character fallover.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanInDirRate
member.summary: LeanInDirection will be increased from 0 to leanInDirMax linearly at this rate.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanInDirMaxF
member.summary: Max of leanInDirection magnitude when going forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanInDirMaxB
member.summary: Max of leanInDirection magnitude when going backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanHipsMaxF
member.summary: Max of leanInDirectionHips magnitude when going forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanHipsMaxB
member.summary: Max of leanInDirectionHips magnitude when going backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.Lean2multF
member.summary: Lean of spine to side in side velocity direction when going forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -5.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.Lean2multB
member.summary: Lean of spine to side in side velocity direction when going backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = -2.0f. Min value = -5.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.PushOffDist
member.summary: Amount stance foot is behind com in the direction of velocity before the leg tries to pushOff to increase momentum. Increase to lower the probability of the pushOff making the character bouncy.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.MaxPushoffVel
member.summary: Stance leg will only pushOff to increase momentum if the vertical hip velocity is less than this value. 0.4 seems like a good value. The higher it is the less this functionality is applied. If it is very low or negative this can stop the pushOff altogether.
member.remarks: Default value = 20.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HipBendMult
member.summary: HipBend scaled with velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.AlwaysBendForwards
member.summary: Bend forwards at the hip (hipBendMult) whether moving backwards or forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineBendMult
member.summary: Spine bend scaled with velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Enable and provide a look-at target to make the character's head turn to face it while balancing, balancer default is 0.2.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HeadLookPos
member.summary: Position of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HeadLookInstanceIndex
member.summary: Level index of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HeadLookAtVelProb
member.summary: Probability [0-1] that headLook will be looking in the direction of velocity when stepping.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TurnOffProb
member.summary: Weighted probability that turn will be off. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.Turn2TargetProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning towards headLook target. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.Turn2VelProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning towards velocity. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TurnAwayProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning away from headLook target. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TurnLeftProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning left. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TurnRightProb
member.summary: Weighted probability of turning right. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.UseBodyTurn
member.summary: Enable and provide a positive bodyTurnTimeout and provide a look-at target to make the character turn to face it while balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.UpperBodyReaction
member.summary: Enable upper body reaction i.e. blindBrace and armswindmill.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the TeeterHelper for sending a Teeter to a given .
member.param: The to send the Teeter to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.EdgeLeft
member.summary: Defines the left edge point (left of character facing edge).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(39.5f, 38.9f, 21.1f). Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.EdgeRight
member.summary: Defines the right edge point (right of character facing edge).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(39.5f, 39.9f, 21.1f). Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.UseExclusionZone
member.summary: Stop stepping across the line defined by edgeLeft and edgeRight.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.UseHeadLook
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.CallHighFall
member.summary: Call highFall if fallen over the edge. If false just call blended writhe (to go over the top of the fall behavior of the underlying behavior e.g. bodyBalance).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.LeanAway
member.summary: Lean away from the edge based on velocity towards the edge (if closer than 2m from edge).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.PreTeeterTime
member.summary: Time-to-edge threshold to start pre-teeter (windmilling, etc).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.LeanAwayTime
member.summary: Time-to-edge threshold to start leaning away from a potential fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.LeanAwayScale
member.summary: Scales stay upright lean and hip pitch.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.TeeterTime
member.summary: Time-to-edge threshold to start full-on teeter (more aggressive lean, drop-and-twist, etc).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.BodyDamping
member.summary: Damping value used for upper body.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.BackBendAmount
member.summary: Amount to bend the back during the flinch.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.6f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.UseRightArm
member.summary: Toggle to use the right arm.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.UseLeftArm
member.summary: Toggle to Use the Left arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.summary: Amplitude of the perlin noise applied to the arms positions in the flinch to the front part of the behavior.

member.summary: Relaxes the character for 1 frame if set.

member.summary: Always protect head. Note if false then character flinches if target is in front, protects head if target is behind.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.DontBraceHead
member.summary: Don't protect head only brace from front. Turned on by bcr.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.ApplyStiffness
member.summary: Turned of by bcr.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.HeadLookAwayFromTarget
member.summary: Look away from target (unless protecting head then look between feet).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Use headlook.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.TurnTowards
member.summary: Ve balancer turn Towards, negative balancer turn Away, 0 balancer won't turn. There is a 50% chance that the character will not turn even if this parameter is set to turn.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = -2. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.Pos
member.summary: Position in world-space of object to flinch from.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: F:GTA.GameVersion.VER_1_0_1737_0_STEAM
member.summary: This value also represents the exe version 1.0.1734.0 for Steam version. 1.0.1737.0 basically works in the same way as 1.0.1734.0 but with bug fixes.

member.name: F:GTA.GameVersion.VER_1_0_1737_0_NOSTEAM
member.summary: This value also represents the exe version 1.0.1734.0 for non-Steam version. 1.0.1737.0 basically works in the same way as 1.0.1734.0 but with bug fixes.

member.name: F:GTA.GameVersion.VER_1_0_2372_0_STEAM

members.member: Draws the menu
Draws the menu with an offset
Called when the menu is first added to the Viewport
Called when the menu gains or regains focus
Called when the user hits the back button or unfocuses from this menu
Called when the user hits the activate button
Called when the user changes the current element (i.e. left and right)
Called when the user changes what element is selected (i.e. up and down)
Called when the MenuItem should be drawn
Called when the MenuItem should be drawn with an offset
Called when the user selects this item
Called when the user deselects this item
Called when the user activates this item (e.g. numpad-5)
Called when the user changes this item (e.g. numpad-4 and 6)
Called by the Menu to set this item's origin
Set by the parent so that the MenuItem can access its properties
Use Ok and Cancel instead of Yes and No
Add a menu to the stack of active menus and set it as focused
Remove a menu from the stack of active menus
Remove the active menu from the stack, this will focus the next highest menu
Closes all menus
Draw all the active UIs
Handles when the activate button is pressed (e.g. numpad-5)
Handles when the back button is pressed (e.g. numpad-0)
Handles when the user presses the up or down button (e.g. numpad-2 and 8)
Handles when the user presses the left or right button (e.g. numpad-4 and 6)
Number of active menus
Have more than one menu on the screen on the time and transition them
The offset each menu in the stack has from the one above it
The top left position of the current menu
